title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
description: After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality in Viva Goals and provide access as they share with their team. Note: The release phase and date have been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
